welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hafnarfjordhur, the charming city known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights at Reykjavik Domestic Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights at Reykjavik Domestic Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Keflavik International Airport handles all international flights and is equipped with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Keflavik International Airport handles all domestic flights within Iceland and offers convenient connections to international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
